name: Lo-Fi VR Sandbox
description:
Created for Winter Melon Game Jam 2022, themed "Cozy".

Devs: Matheus Vilano, Daniel Jones, Pedro D'Andrea

Players can control each instrument track by moving nodes in 3D space. The height determines the volume and horizontal movement determines the pitch.

The song Badoof is original, created by Lonyeld (Matheus Vilano).

All 3D assets and VFX were found in Quixel or acquired from unreal marketplace and slightly edited/tuned to better fit the experience.

Special Thanks: Brett Taves for UI assets and moral support, Ericka Florencia for Ambience Sound
